Recipes.Name: Spear_Stone
Recipes.Description: The Stone spear is short but powerful. With a spear you can aim at one specific enemy

Recipes.Name: Spear_Metal
Recipes.Description: The Metal Spear is long for further reach but it is not the strongest. With a spear you can aim at one specific enemy

Recipes.Name: Sword_Stone
Recipes.Description: The Stone Sword is short but powerful. With the sword you can hit multiple targets with one swing.

Recipes.Name: Sword_Metal
Recipes.Description: The Metal Sword is long for further reach but it is not the strongest. With the sword you can hit multiple targets with one swing.

Recipes.Name: CampFire
Recipes.Description: The campfire allows you to disable one hex of your choice for a full wave. This will prevent Twitch from using that hex.

Recipes.Name: Flashlight
Recipes.Description: The Flashlight allows you to shine light on a wolve and scare it away from a chicken.

Recipes.Name: Torch
Recipes.Description: The Torch allows you to create a safe radius around you from the wolves to be able to protect all the chicken in the area.

Recipes.Name: Pick_Axe
Recipes.Description: The Pich Axe will allow you to quickly destroy any rocks in the game. This is useful for the rock walls.

Recipes.Name: Wood_Axe
Recipes.Description: The Wood Axe let's you cut down trees to stop forest fires from spreading.

Recipes.Name: Boots of Leporine Swiftness
Recipes.Description: The Boots of Swiftness let you move quickly around the map to collect chickens quicker and to run away from bears easier.

Recipes.Name: Heaven Shattering Hammer
Recipes.Description: The Hammer is just a really big a strong weapon. Enjoy.

Recipes.Name: Net
Recipes.Description: The Net can be used to instantly collect a chicken with one swing.

Recipes.Name: Cooked_Meat
Recipes.Description: Meat lets you regain your health.
